array.string: Disclaimer
Contact

This app can be viewed in two languages (Chinese and English) and is solely developed by Eddie Li. It is not for commercial use. It is only used to help new immigrants to better understand the driving rules and remind the drivers of these rules again. Please contact me if you have any questions. Thanks for your understanding.
Email: eddies.appspot@gmail.com Website: www.eddieli.org

DEER REGULARLY CROSS, BE ALERT FOR ANIMALS
DO NOT STAND OR STOP IN THIS AREA
YOU MUST EXIT IF YOU REMAIN IN RIGHT HAND LANE

DO NOT BLOCK INTERSECTION

A HIDDEN SCHOOL BUS STOP AHEAD, SLOW DOWN, DRIVE WITH EXTRA CAUTION WATCH FOR CHILDREN AND SCHOOL BUSES WITH FLASHING RED LIGHTS

DURING SCHOOL HOURS WHEN THE YELLOW LIGHTS ARE FLASHING, FOLLOW THE SPEED LIMIT SHOWN

NEVER

PASS JUST AS YOU WOULD WITH ANOTHER CAR
